thread.title: World's worst stretcher bearers struggle mightily taking injured soccer player off the field
thread.title_full: World's worst stretcher bearers struggle mightily taking injured soccer player off the field

title: World's worst stretcher bearers struggle mightily taking injured soccer player off the field
text:
World’s worst stretcher bearers struggle mightily taking injured soccer player off the field Resize Text By Cindy Boren October 19 at 12:50 PM Follow @cindyboren 
Thanks for your interest, but the competition for the world’s worst stretcher bearers is now closed. We have a winner! 
Not once, but twice the men tasked with carrying the injured Leonardo Koutris from a soccer field in Greece tripped and dropped the stretcher. It made for high comedy, unless your name happened to be Leonardo Koutris. 
And then, when the bearers get off the pitch, they drop Koutris with a thud. To make matters worse, Koutris’ Ergotelis team lost to AE Larissa in the Greek Second Division tilt. VÍDEO Leonardo Koutris, a la llitera dels horrors #futbolint http://t.co/oKUusJTPCM pic.twitter.com/1pVaFqOF3L 
— Esport3 (@esport3) October 19, 2015 
Still, as Homer Simpson could attest if he were, you know, a real person, it could have been worse. After spending most of her career in traditional print sports journalism, Cindy began blogging and tweeting, first as NFL/Redskins editor, and, since August 2010, at The Early Lead. She also is the social media editor for Sports. sports Success! Check your inbox for details. You might also like: Please enter a valid email address Sign Up
